title: President lauds police for eliminating four terrorists in Dera Ghazi Khan
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 01 (APP):President Asif Ali Zardari Sunday paid tribute to security forces for eliminating four Khawarij during an operation in Dera Ghazi Khan.
He praised the bravery of police officers and personnel for killing the four terrorists of Fitna al-Khawarij during the operation.
He said the law enforcement institutions will continue their operations till complete wipe out of terrorists.
The successful operations of security forces of Pakistan for eradication of terrorists was a positive development, he added.
“We have unwavering determination to finish off terrorist elements and defend the country,” he remarked.
The President expressed national resolve to completely exterminate Fitna al-Khawarij.
